programme.title: Life After Genocide
programme.desc: A survivor of war, Clemantine Wamariya was just 6 years old when she ran for her life during the Rwandan genocide. For 12 years, Clemantine and her sister Claire searched for their family, but it seemed all hope was lost... Until they received a shocking family letter that cracked their hearts wide open. What happened? And why did Clemantine want everyone to know her name?

programme.title: Ultimate Freedom March: Remembering John Lewis
programme.desc: This short documentary is a tribute to the memory of civil rights leader John Lewis, his relationship with Martin Luther King Jr. and the courage he showed in fighting for an ideal, for freedom, democracy and justice. There is a moment in everyones life when our hearts are pounding and we are inspired and motivated to be the hero of our story. Step forward and go for what you believe in.

programme.title: Chadwick Boseman: Live Your Purpose
programme.desc: Chadwick Boseman lived a life of humility and service on and off screen. He didnt let his diagnosis stop him from showing up for those around him and using his platform to elevate black voices. A true hero, he made every day count.

programme.title: Escaping North Korea: The Search for Freedom
programme.desc: Yeonmi Park was deprived of her childhood and forced to grow up far too quickly in horrifying circumstances under the tyrannical regime of KIM JONG-UN. When she was smuggled out of North Korea she hoped to find freedom and a better life, but things only got worse. This is her story.

programme.title: Linda Cliatt-Wayman: A Teacher Like No Other
programme.desc: Linda Cliatt-Wayman volunteered to be Principal of one of the most dangerous schools in America. On her first day, she quickly realized that the job was much more complex and frightening than she thought. But, she was determined to give her students hope, even when they were threatening her life.

programme.title: Cynthia Vigil: Escaping The Toy-Box Killer
programme.desc: March 20th, 1999, Cynthia meets up with her friend, never expecting she is minutes away from being abducted. When she wakes up, a chilling voice speaks to her – its coming from a recording. As her tears dry up, the early memories of her tough childhood revive, and a voice in her heart tells her: escape.

programme.title: Tupac Shakur: Fight For A Better World
programme.desc: Legendary hip hop artist Tupac Shakur left this world far too early, but it’s clear that he and his music had a lasting impact. Surrounded by violence and injustice Tupac fought for a better world.

programme.title: Brian Bushway: Blind Sports
programme.desc: Record breaking mountain biker Brian Bushway became totally blind at the age of 14. He went from being an active teen outdoors to depression and uncertainty. He never thought he would be able to ride his bike again, until he developed a superpower that allowed him to see.

programme.title: Aim for the Skies
programme.desc: Busy and uptight mother wishes her kid would just grow up. But when her science-loving son sets off a rocket ship inside the house, she completely loses it. Will this strict mom break her little boy’s dreams?

programme.title: Rock Thomas - Rock Bottom
programme.desc: Rock Thomas delivers a powerful, personal story on how to resist the labels forced on you in order to redefine yourself

programme.title: From Foster to Family
programme.desc: Anthony Trucks was on the fast track to becoming a young star in the NFL. But when his dark past caught up with him, it nearly destroyed everything he’d worked so hard for. How did Anthony persevere? And what valuable lesson about IDENTITY SHIFTING did he learn that you can apply to your own life?

programme.title: 10x Your Life
programme.desc: Author, entrepreneur, and sales savant, Grant Cardone, breaks down the power of his 10X Rule and how you can use it to multiply your success.

programme.title: Man of Ice: Wim Hof's Dark Secret
programme.desc: Wim Hof baffles experts --thriving in freezing cold temperatures and swimming under ice in just shorts. But little did the world know that The Ice Man was harboring a heartbreaking secret that drove him to try & conquer the bitter cold.

programme.title: Find Your Talent
programme.desc: Tom Bilyeu, co-founder of Quest Nutrition and co-founder & CEO of Impact Theory, reveals how this shift in mindset helped him find his passion.

programme.title: When Everything Falls Apart
programme.desc: Brendon Burchard recounts how a tragic heartbreak and a near-death experience led him to discover the 3 most important questions you can ask yourself.

programme.title: Real Stories With Wim Hof
programme.desc: In this bonus exclusive Goalcast interview, find out what Wim Hofs mother said to him at a very young age that drives every move he makes. Wim Hof is a world record breaker and a global phenomenon. He is famous for his superhuman ability to perform extreme long-distance swimming under freezing water. But the Iceman believes he has a special calling in the world.

programme.title: Statistic or Success Story?
programme.desc: Josh Shipp brings us to the critical turning point in his life and explains how you can make a difference.

programme.title: What Breaks you, Shapes You
programme.desc: Sarah Montana tells her heart-stopping true story about the unthinkable traumas she endured in her young life.

programme.title: Hawking's Last Message to Humanity
programme.desc: Famous cosmologist and all-around inspirational human Stephen Hawking delivers a final speech before he departed us for worlds beyond.

programme.title: Life Lessons from Gangsters
programme.desc: Father Gregory Boyles work as the founder of Homeboy Industries has greatly impacted the lives of so many. His hilarious and inspiring story reminds us all that there is no us and them, just us.

programme.title: The Simple Rule that will Change your Life
programme.desc: Life coach and motivational speaker Mel Robbins shares her simple solution for outsmarting your brain to make better decisions and improve your life.

programme.title: Employer's Worst Nightmare
programme.desc: A toxic employee bullies her coworker and competes to win a new project. Will it be the rude, Harvard-educated "star" employee? Or her colleague whos just trying to do her best?

programme.title: The Fundamental Truth About Love
programme.desc: Adam Reid Shares Expert Advice on a Fundamental Truth About Love. This Speech about the true source of love will change how you approach relationships forever!

programme.title: The Trap of Arrogance
programme.desc: A spoiled girl thinks she can use her rich dad to get ahead in life. From disrespecting the “janitor” to trying to bribe her way into getting a job, her arrogance knows no boundaries. When she gets exposed during a job interview, she receives a massive reality check on the importance of hard work and integrity.

programme.title: "Financial Training for Troops, Crowdfunding, and Facing Fears"
programme.desc: Investment advisor Ric Edelman joins the Army for a limited tour of duty to help train our troops financially; interviews scientist and entrepreneur Raymond McCauley about strength in numbers with crowdfunding; and Jean Edelman looks at facing our fears.

programme.title: Fast Track Your Retirement
programme.desc: Have the years raced by without saving for retirement being a priority? You are in good company. Financial professionals Joe Anderson and Alan Clopine give you tips to fast rack your retirement after 40. Planning for your retirement takes a different approach when you havent focused on it until the time horizon for retirement isnt that far off in the distance. From putting a plan in place, keeping more of what you make to making sure you dont derail your retirement, this segment is a must-see for anyone falling short of their savings goals.

programme.title: Should You Switch Retirement Contributions to Roth?
programme.desc: "Is it better to save for retirement in traditional 401(k)s and IRAs, or in Roth accounts? That s today on Your Money, Your Wealth podcast 518 with Joe Anderson, CFP® and Big Al Clopine, CPA. Plus, what are the rules around contributing to two different types of Roth accounts? If required minimum distributions will be staggered because of a couple s age difference, should they convert their retirement savings to Roth, or leave it alone? But first, Joe and Big Al have a backdoor Roth conversion withdrawal debate to settle."

programme.title: America's Dangerous Obsession with Entrepreneurship
programme.desc: "I dont need to tell you about all of the problems with celebrity culture, but America has a more damaging obsession that most people instinctively root for. Entrepreneur culture is costing everybody a lot of money even if they never start a business of their own. So, its time to learn How Money Works to find out why most people shouldnt be entrepreneurs even when everybody says its the greatest thing ever."

programme.title: The Homeless Industrial Complex
programme.desc: America has a homelessness crisis as record numbers of people are ending up on the streets of a few concentrated city centers. Cities are spending billions of dollars and helping the homeless has become a lucrative business with multi-million dollar government contracts.

programme.title: TFD: I Don't Have A Degree. I Still Support Student Debt Forgiveness

programme.title: TFD: The Dos and Donts of Preparing for a Recession

programme.title: Saschiz Old Town, Romania
programme.desc: Saschiz, village, and commune, Mureș județ county is located in central Romania. The villages of Saschiz, Mihai Viteazu, and Cloașterf make up the larger commune of Saschiz. Located in the old region of Transylvania, it lies about 20 km east of Sighișoara"&". First documented in the 14th century, Saschiz is known for its medieval fortress and church constructed by Transylvanian Saxons, a German speaker. They settled in Transylvania when it was part of Hungary. The ruins of the 14th-century fortress sit atop "&"a hill overlooking the village. The late 15th-century fortified church has Gothic details and an imposing clock tower. Along with five other villages with fortified churches, Saschiz was inscribed on UNESCO’s World Heritage sites in 1999.

programme.title: PRISMA
programme.desc: Prisma es un programa cultural producido por CGTN en español en colaboración con el multimedio de comunicación latinoamericano teleSUR. Su objetivo es mostrar a los televidentes la riqueza cultural de China y el mundo hispanohablante, elevar el conocimiento de la cultura china en los países de habla hispana y establecer una plataforma de diálogo entre ambas partes. Se trata de un programa mensual de 30 minutos de duración que comenzó a emitirse en agosto de 2016. Está compuesto de tres segmentos que destacan por su diversidad temática. Primero, un espacio de noticias culturales; después, una semblanza de alguna personalidad del ámbito cultural latinoamericano; y finalmente un documental sobre aspectos de la cultura china.

Almost Ablaze
programme.desc: Join the Teton Gravity Research crew for a look behind the scenes of Almost Ablaze, TGR's 2014 film. Athletes and crew alike push the limits of what's possible in the world of ski films.

programme.title: Kayak Fishing Lake Erie
programme.desc: Fishing and kayaking is an unbeatable combination, as it allows you to fish in places inaccessible by boat or foot. Join host, Ken Whiting, as he meets up with Baer Fishing Adventures to chase pike and bass from their kayaks in the marshes surrounding Long Point Bay in Southern Ontario's Norfolk County.

programme.title: Deep Water
programme.desc: Deep Water is a captivating exploration of fear, mentorship, and deep water soloing in panoramic Ha Long Bay, Vietnam with psicobloc pioneer Tim Emmett and competition climber Kyra Condie. Watch as Kyra learns from the master, tackles the fear of climbing high above the water, and then succeeds on one of the hardest deep water solos in Vietnam, The Lightning Crack, graded 5.13. Ha Long Bay, Vietnam is a scenic climbing venue with over 3000 limestone formations dotting the ocean bay.

programme.title: The World of Waves
programme.desc: “The World of Waves” is an astonishing look at the ocean and the waves it creates to all the corners of the world. This film is completely shot on 35mm film as well as on the Red and Phantom camera’s. The visuals are nothing short of mind blowing, backed up with a soundtrack that puts you right in the action. This film embraces images that will last in your mind for eternity. Never before have angles and images in the ocean been captured in pure raw form.

programme.title: Ballan
programme.desc: Biopic on Alessandro Ballan, the Italian cyclist who became World Champion in 2008, before the absurd disqualification for doping, subsequently being fully absolved after a long battle for the truth.

programme.title: Kayaking the 'Canadian Amazon'
programme.desc: Big Creek in Southern Ontario's Norfolk County is commonly referred to as ‘the Canadian Amazon’ as it winds its way through thick forest, while presenting paddlers with a natural obstacle course of fallen trees. Join host, Ken Whiting, as he explores this ecological wonder from the seat of his kayak.

programme.title: Way Of Life

programme.desc: The story begins with a world-weary priest (Clive Russell) carrying out his mundane daily duties to a dwindling congregation. A violent, desperate man (Peter Cadwell) breaks into the church and begins a heavyweight bout of soul-searching and redemption, reflecting and refracting the anxiety and anger of contemporary society.

programme.title: LOVE IS NOT ENOUGH
programme.desc: A filmmaker is given a commission to make a pop video but takes the money and attempts to complete his own long term film project. He takes to the road and tries to re-engage his old cast but finds them no longer interested in the film. Things go from bad to worse when the crew he has managed to recruit also decide to bail out. This is a film about perseverance in the face of adversity.

programme.title: Deivamagal Episode 31
programme.desc: Deivamagal is an Indian Tamil-language soap opera starring Vani Bhojan and Krishna. It was broadcast on Sun TV initially from Monday to Friday and later extended to Saturday at 8 PM from 25 March 2013 to 17 February 2018 for 1,466 episodes. The show replaced S. Kumarans successful soap, Thirumathi Selvam, and replaced by Nayagi. The show is produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S. Kumaran. This serial was shot in Pollachi, Chennai, Chengalpet, Hyderabad, Kerala, Puducherry, and Cuddalore. This is the first TV serial shot in the Bay of Bengal Plot Prakash his wife Sathyapriya and his eldest sister-in-law Gayathris conspiracies against their families to conquer Prakshs ancestral property Jai Hind Vilas.

programme.title: The Date
programme.desc: A date that turned into a nightmare, thanks to the rat trio. With a spring in his step, all Doggy Don wanted was a romantic and quiet date with his girlfriend. After being drenched in Chili Sauce, bathed in cement, and brushing with Dynamite, Its surprising that there was any bit of him left for the date. But Alas the trios are the rightful owners of the last laugh!

programme.title: Three Little Pigs
programme.desc: Three little pigs decide to leave home and live separately for their own good. Little pigs each build a house to live in until a wolf makes an appearance.

programme.title: THE DRILL GRILL
programme.desc: Construction workers leave the plot near to the hotel leaving behind their drilling machine. In the crowded hotel while Sundar is busy serving customers a loud whining sound bothers everyone. Its Basha who has found a new innovative way to be an instigator. He drills the ground with a huge drilling machine just to grill Sundar. As expected, a mad chase ensues where Basha is coming up with hilarious ideas using the drilling machine he is drilling into the earth and popping up in the tea shop stealing stuff, he is making the entire glass almirah filled with snacks vanish right underground, he jumps on the drilling machine like a jumping jack snatching food from the customers, he even makes the customer vanish underground only to throw them back minus their food. Things go haywire with a screaming Sundar chasing him. And when at last when Sundar procures the drilling machine, he trying to switch it off makes the entire hotel collapse standing proudly right in front of Chai Raja. God save Sundar!

programme.title: Dolphin Tales
programme.desc: Dunky has taken a small picnic bag and takes Keet to the lake. A nice day as by the lake very peaceful. Keet sees two dolphins in the lake and plays with them as they get friendly with each other. The prowling Cat is not too happy. And tries various antics to catch Keet with funny results. The dolphins become good friends with Keet and teach Cat a lesson to remember for a longtime

programme.title: MAKEOVER
programme.desc: On the anniversary, Chai Raja wants the interior to be swankier and hires a painter to do his forefathers portrait (looks a lot like him)- only the painter is a free-loader who paints less and swipes snacks more- and he is even shiftier than Basha. Sundar quickly notices the painters nicking habits, but cant convince Chai Raja of the same. Basha, on the other hand finds himself up against someone who is craftier than Sundar. Sundar and Basha in their own ways try to bring the thieving painter to book (while Sundar tries to amp up the portrait as well) and succeed in ousting the crook, though much cant be said of Chai Rajas portrait ... in the end it looks more like Sundars forefather than Chai Rajas.

programme.title: Heungboo and Nolboo
programme.desc: Mischievous UGo takes all of his parents property and kicks his younger brother GoGo out of the house. Meanwhile, a swallow bird brings a gourd seed to the eaves of a kind-hearted GoGo house, and soon, gourds containing gold and silver treasures opens on the roof of the GoGos house.

programme.title: MONKEY KALARI
programme.desc: A Kalari Gurukkal does a demonstration outside the Chai shop and suddenly the hotel has a massive swell of customers jostling in. Chai Raja is thrilled at the sudden pile of customers as tea glasses and snacks fly off the counter and even the flies are shooed off their hangout for lack of space. The extra publicity is great and Chai Raja sends out a complimentary snack plate with Sundar to the Kalari Guru- Basha planning to swipe a few complimentary snacks himself follows Sundar but then stops short as he sees the high leaps and stunts of the Gurukkal suddenly Basha is extremely interested in learning the art. (Basha sees the kalari moves as a easy way to out-of reach snack shelves). He approaches the teacher, but the latter is a stern man and is not easily coaxed. Basha tries buttering up the Gurukkal- at first the lazy Sundar doesnt clue in but when he realizes that Basha plans to use the Kalari moves to chomp away the fries kept for the customers. Sundar decides (thought bubbles) to master the art himself and beat Basha before he can succeed. Now the Kalari Guru has two very-very interested/undesired disciples who are intent on learning- or not letting the other one learn- Kalari! Add to this the fact that Chai Raja is losing his cool thanks to Sundar neglecting the customers and his job for the sake of the lessons. Sundar has to dash off for a bit and Basha creates his own Kalari moves. Its no time for monkeying but will Sundar realize that before its too late?

programme.title: Sleepwalker
programme.desc: Gummy sleepwalks – making himself an elaborate snack and proving that you can sometimes even have fun while you’re asleep!

programme.title: LOTTERY
programme.desc: Chai Raja buys a lottery ticket from a ticket seller who passes by. Chai Raja dreams of him in a 7 storeyed teashop, with many Sundars cleaning and serving around. Getting out of his dream, Chai Raja writes down the number on the wall and hands the ticket to Sundar. Sundar, caught up in his chores tucks it away in his tent but forgets about it. Next day Sundar look at the newspaper and is stunned to see that the ticket has won the prize!Sundar searches high and low inside his paraphernalia, watched by Basha till he finally finds it in his tent. Sundar lapses into a day-dream in which he owns the 7 storeyed teashop with Chai Raja at his service and Basha cleaning around. However, Basha pokes his tail popping the dream and dashes off with the ticket. A mad chase, ensues as Sundar tries to get back the ticket. Basha wants the ticket for himself so that his own dream may come true that of being the owner of the 7 storeyed teashop with bananas all around and Chai Raja, his personal chef. (Sundar will be the entertainment). The chase starts now for the ticket. Chai Raja has no clue as to what is happening. As the chase happens, the greedy customers want to get their hands on it as well. The ticket finally falls and there is a pile-up outside the shop as everyone dives for it. Sundar emerges, dishevelled and bruised but holding the ticket- only to have it chewed by a nanny goat! By then Chai Raja arrives at the scene realizing what just happened.

programme.title: Field Trip Fiasco
programme.desc: The bros set out for a trip to the great Qutab Minar. And they make sure that they got rid of the rat trio before entering. But Larry Charly and Marly are way too smarter than any of us. To make matters worse, they bombard the entire structure and put the blame on Don and Colonel. Will they ever escape this??

programme.title: The Garden Guardians
programme.desc: The Wise Elders ask the Guardians to take care of their vegetable garden while they go on a trip. Xia and April think it’s the dullest job ever, but Pai is over the moon. Negu seizes the chance to send his Mutant Beetles, who try to wreck the garden, making Pai’s life impossible. He has to use a secret known only to the most green-fingered gardeners to beat the Mutants and save the garden.

programme.title: Moo-Ing Trouble!
programme.desc: Help! There is a cow in the bathroom this time, and he is on a mad eating spree, happily mooing away soap bubbles too!Don & Colonel try in vain to get rid of the cow but the three mice seem to have a different agenda. To make matters worse, a bull has made its grand entry into the scene too

programme.title: KUSHTI ME MASTI
programme.desc: It is a regular morning in hotel Kelifornia until the much feared wrestler comes in for food. Sundar is all set to please him. But things go for a toss when the wrestlers arch-rival comes in and expects to be served by Sundar. A hapless Sundar is torn between the two angry fat men. And to add to the misery is our super mischievous Basha who is making sure that Sundar messes up everything with the wrestlers. The chain of events reach a point where the wrestlers start a kushti fight inside the hotel and BashamakES sure that Sundar becomes their punching bag. Will Sundars luck save him?!!!

programme.title: LEMONAIDING THE ENEMY
programme.desc: Feeling sorry for Mark, the Ninjas throw him a bone. This almost backfires, however, when he unexpectedly returns accompanied by Durian and a gang of chumplings.

programme.title: The Smighty Express
programme.desc: Creating Smighty Railroad, a secret way to the Smighty Stones, was a good idea, until the Villains found out. The Super Six must embark on a suspenseful and high-speed train race across all of Smightyland to stop Sneevil and Biggs in their locomotive from reaching the Stones first.

programme.title: CHOCOLATE CHAI
programme.desc: Chai Raja wants to swish up a new kind of recipe for teatime in order attract more customers. Sundar who has snuck in a tasty bar of chocolate is trying to sneak a bite as he goes about his chores in the kitchen. However thanks to his clumsiness or an altercation with Basha, Sundars chocolate bar ends up in Chai Rajas experimental kettle. Chai Raja is extremely angry at first but when he gives it a taste, he realizes that hes hit the jackpot. The customers cant get enough of the chocolate Chai and by word of mouth (shown comically like a Chinese whisper leading right upto the a famous chef) , news of his creation reaches the ears of a famous Chef. The Chef turns up at hotel Kelifornia and on tasting it wants the recipe for himself. He offers Chai Raja a lot of cash but Chai Raja refuses. But the Chef not ready to give up, decides to steal the recipe. He ropes in Basha and tries to get Sundar too to spill the beans. Its utter confusion as Sundar muddles up the Chefs ploy and Basha gets distracted by the fries far too often for the Chefs good.

programme.title: WHATS IN A NAME
programme.desc: Sundar is trying to oust Basha as usual from the shop when he accidentally damages the signboard of the tea-shop. Moustache bristling, Chai Raja assigns Sundar the task of painting a new signboard for the tea shop but Basha is all set to botch it up. Each time Sundar paints on the hotels name, Basha streaks in wrecking havoc. he sometimes adds unnecessary caricatures of Chai Raja to the signboard, at yet others tweaks the spelling and even adjusts it so that it falls on a couple of unsuspecting customers causing Chai Rajas heart to palpitate. Sundar better pull up his paws and get on with the job for Chai Raja is as fond of his hotels exotic name as he is of serving up his exotic brews. FinallySundar loses and a mad chase and crash against the kitchen counter Sundar gulps sure that he is going to get the boot...but Chai Raja is grinning. The new signboard goes up and gets a big thumbs-up from everyone it spells the hotel name in tea-stains (with banana fritters and tea sieves interspersed). Sundar heaves a sigh of relief...for once!

programme.title: Show Time
programme.desc: We start the show with a close up of the remote the camera pulls out to see Keet picking the remote and starts watching the last episode of “ Bigger boss” a reality show on TV.

programme.title: Happy Halloween
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: Invisible Don
programme.desc: To take revenge on the rats, Don makes a potion for invisibility. He has one hell of a time playing with Charly, Marly Larry and even King Chomp. But there was some potion remaining. Oo la la! Who will drink it???

programme.title: Dunky's Day in
programme.desc: Dunky has high fever and cannot tolerate any kind of noise. Cat has not had lunch as Dunky is sick… Keet fools him a lot by offering empty glasses for water..

programme.title: Water, Water Every Where
programme.desc: GrandPA takes the trio for a small ride to the nearby towns newly opened mini waterpark. Cat is all excited and is wearing water goggles and a snorkeling gear.

programme.title: SOMETHING STINKS
programme.desc: Negu has his henchmen pump a foul green fog up to the Yan World, forcing the Elders to evacuate the Westerly Breeze. Aboard the Lord of the Wind, Pai fails to impress the Elders and gets “Rocky Rodent” – a crisis of confidence. The Elders have to pump Pai’s confidence back up so he can help Xia and April defeat the Worm Monster sent by Negu.

programme.title: Golden Eggs
programme.desc: Hoodie has his eyes on the hens eggs in GrandPAs farm. Keet has saved them once but is sure Hoodie will try again.

programme.title: Robot Maid
programme.desc: GrandPA gets a big courier box at his doorstep voila ! it’s a robot maid and she is very efficient in the house within minutes she sparkles the house.

programme.title: A Book for a Book
programme.desc: Cat is sick of Keet winning all the time. He runs through the newspapers and sees an ad of a book ”10 ways to catch a parrot”.

programme.title: Smorigins
programme.desc: The Super Six go back in time to find out the origins of the Smighty Stones. The Villains tag along, too and find themselves in the middle of a prehistoric dragon battle.

programme.title: Happy ending
programme.desc: The twins jump into a story and find out that the characters are stuck, because the last pages of the book are missing. So the twins invent the ending themselves, discovering the power of imagination, and when they go back home they understand they can create a new recipe with the ingredients they’ve got.

programme.title: Neighbour Watch
programme.desc: There is a beautiful new girl in the neighbourhood. Everyone from the rat trio to Don to Colonel to King Chomp is bewitched by her. Now the place is all about wooing and flirting and fighting for the pretty betty. But there is a naughty twist in the story when a new guys lands. Who is it???

programme.title: The Egg
programme.desc: Gummy wakes up with a mysterious egg in his bedroom – and, over Harry’s objections, becomes convinced that it’s ‘Junior’, a future soccer star!

programme.title: The Deep Freeze
programme.desc: After not following the steps to find Odessas hidden treasure, a frustrated Pancake enters the Zooniverse to find it covered in ice and snow. To "turn back on" Mt Zoonihorn, he must follow the steps and learn from his friends mistakes. Determination and following the correct steps can lead to success.

programme.title: More Ways Than One
programme.desc: When Pancake cuts Maple’s toast differently than Mama does, it sends Maple into a tailspin. Then in the Zooniverse an art competition shows her that different can be good. There can be more than one way to do things, and each can be right.

programme.title: Baby Sitting
programme.desc: It’s the summer holidays. GrandPA’s daughter is visiting her dad from the neighboring town with her year old baby.

programme.title: The baby dromedary
programme.desc: The twins help a little pharaoh to find his lost pet, a baby dromedary.

programme.title: Country Mouse and City Mouse
programme.desc: Country Mouse GoGo receives a letter from his urban friend UGo, and leaves for the city.

programme.title: Kiwi, flightless birds
programme.desc: When the gods were still ruling the world, when trees and flowers on the ground began to wither due to insects, the goddess WI-Go asks Kiwi to do the hard work of catching insects, and she readily accepts the GoGo.

programme.title: Yes Gummy
programme.desc: Feeling a little ‘blah’, Gummy decides to say ‘yes’ to everything that crosses his path. Comic disaster, naturally, soon follows...

programme.title: Hopeless Dreams
programme.desc: Cat is taking a cat nap as Keet flies in and bangs a pan on Cats head and wakes him up. Cat gets up in a start and amazed by what he sees.

programme.title: TUNNEL OF WHUH
programme.desc: After limited success with the direct assault approach, Durian grey employs some more underhanded tactics to destroy the Ninjas from the inside.

programme.title: Harvest Attack
programme.desc: Its harvest time and Dunky has given Cat the duty of protecting the fields with a sling and pebbles and Keet is to give him warnings if Hoodie the crow attacks the field with his gang

programme.title: Ski Trip Fun!
programme.desc: Don and Colonel are on a vacation, skiing in Shimla. You think the trio would leave them alone?? Hell no!! Romance blossoms in the snow and the rats make sure that Don and Colonel turn against each other. And they have a great time watching them fight.

programme.title: Mess at Museum
programme.desc: Dunky takes Keet and Cat to the towns museum which is inside a home to a lot of precious artifacts.

programme.title: Meep Meep Charlie’s
programme.desc: Boris and Sandy are fighting over the water sprayer and drenching Uncle Charlie with it. This leaves Charlie with no choice but to call on Deedee’s magic. Deedee finds a spell to make friendship dust as the perfect solution. Whoever the dust falls on will be best friends with whoever they see first. Happy for getting the magic powder they all set off to see Boris and Sandy. But on the way the Doobydoos rush at them so suddenly that they fall all over them and the Doobydoos become friends of Charlie and carry him off. Nino tries to explain the situation to Deedee, but she is too busy to listen. Back over at Charlie’s, the Doobydoos are treating him as a king and tries to run away from his new friends. Deedee finds some of the missing magic powder but tries to find Charlie. Deedee tries to bring things back to normal with magic, but Nino is against it. They find a way to get the twins to work together and splash the Doobydoos with water and wash off the friendship dust. The twins are friends again even though Deedee’s magic didn’t work as expected.

programme.title: Where is it?
programme.desc: During a game of hide and seek Deedee and Nino come across a panicky Mewmew who cannot locate his key. Deedee creates a spell to get back all of Mewmew’s missing things and in come his key, including his long lost bubble-cordion and pocket fork. But Mewmew doesn’t want those things back as he had already replaced them. So Deedee offers to keep them as she couldn’t stand the sight of them being thrown away. On the way they find Charlie hiding from his lost but newly found alarm clock that is chasing him. The clock won’t let Charlie sleep a bit by ringing all the time, so Deedee offers to take it along with the rest. Deedee gets many more additions to her lost and found group as many more citizens of Abra-Dabra are affected with lost things. But as Deedee doesn’t have any space to store them, she puts up a give-away store. Now everyone’s happy.

programme.title: Sponge
programme.desc: Soak up the creativity like a sponge would, lets see what Hepi and Briko are up to

programme.title: Hansel and Gretel
programme.desc: GoGo and UGo are close siblings. While collecting mushrooms, they smell something delicious and find a house made of snacks. When they cheerfully walk in, the two realizes it belongs to a scary wizard.

programme.title: Fussy eater
programme.desc: The twins meet a mother dromedary and her child - they have a long trip across the desert ahead of them but the baby is too fussy an eater to have a healthy lunch.

programme.title: Flash Blind
programme.desc: Don rips apart the parcel and out comes A Brand New Camera! Don is on a clicking spree. He makes colonel pose and ends up clicking Ballu. From friends to enemies to the innards of his tummy, he captures it all.

programme.title: The Magic Lamp
programme.desc: Gummy finds an old magic lamp – complete with a genie popping out when he chances to rub it. The three pals suddenly have three wishes .

programme.title: Money Problems
programme.desc: Speed and his friends have succeeded in acquiring the missing part from the Shadow Organization, but upon trying to make it work with the Mach 6, they are thrust into an alternate reality where the Shadowy Organization is in charge. They must return the part to where they found it, in Shadowy Org HQ, in order to get back to the present. Now that theyve had a glimpse of the Shadowy org.s master plan, they know what they have to do to stop them.

programme.title: JOY RIDE
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to clean the Lord of the Wind. They can’t resist riding the annual Surf Winds, but Xia and April end up captured by the Wind Beast. Pai rescues them by repulsing the sensitive Wind Beast with his onion and sulfur-geyser stink.

programme.title: The Big Wave
programme.desc: Sneevil and Biggs set off a Smightynami wave that threatens to wash away Smightyland. Dude has to ride the big one and save the day.

programme.title: Rowdy Cloudy
programme.desc: When Pancake angers a cloud by not listening, the livid cumulus vents its anger by taking Pancake on a wild ride, storming all over the Zooniverse. An apology, when sincere, can help make things right.

programme.title: Science Unfair
programme.desc: Fred is not prepared to enter the school science fair, but at the last minute, he transforms Friday into a glove that dispenses soda from the fingers. He wins! Soon he learns though that the fair was an effort to find someone with small enough hands to blast into space and rescue the stranded Astronaut, and Brains’ hero, Caribou Caruthers.

programme.title: The Emperor Comes to Town
programme.desc: The Emperor of China is coming to town and the people of Baghdad are tasked to put on their best show as he passes through the market. Genie is thrilled, what talent shall he put on to impress the Emperor? Jamillah has a great idea for a circus act, and she asks them both to help her do a running cartwheel only they all fall over when they try in front of the Emperor and a very angry Grand Vizier. Just when hes about to send them all to jail however, the Emperor chuckles, he thinks its all hilarious! As a prize he invites them all to dine with him and the Sultan.

programme.title: Cruise Blues
programme.desc: On the deck of the cruise, Titanic-style Don and Colonel stand facing the sea, enjoying the breeze until the shark leaps up in the air. Where ever Don is, Charly Lary and Marly are sure to follow. Watch them battle sharks and take on the sea!

programme.title: Prickly Pair
programme.desc: Nino is having a tough time trying to put his daisies up as desired to win the Wonderful Window Box competition that Mayor De Pfeffle is hosting. Deedee cheers him up by saying that flowers can be placed anywhere as long as it makes Abra-Dabra more beautiful. Just then Mewmew runs in all flustered and panicky. The problem seems to be that the creeper plant at Mewmew’s window hasn’t grown big enough to creep all around the heart-shaped support. But Deedee can’t help with magic, as it would be unfair in the competition against everyone else. Charlie loves his display but is being overprotective by shooing the twins away to play ball elsewhere. The twins accidentally throw the ball directly at Uncle Charlie’s display, knocking them all down and breaking them in the process. But there’s no time to fix them up without magic. Deedee brews a magic potion with a few ingredients. The magic potion makes all of Charlie’s flowers into cacti, something Charlie dislikes the most. Since Deedee feels she’s let Charlie down, they all decide to take theor very own flowers to replace Charlie’s exhibit. But with a sudden spelt of rain, all are damaged by the time they reach Charlie’s. But the rain has also caused the cacti to bloom, a rare sight indeed. Mayor De Pfeffle awards Uncle Charlie with the honour of being winner of the Wonderful Window Boz contest. But Charlie wants to share the award with all his friends

programme.title: Melody's Powerful Music
programme.desc: Sneevil creates a powerful magnet to draw an iron asteroid towards Smightyland. Melody must summon her power of rock to blast the asteroid out of the sky before its too late.

programme.title: PAI PROBLEM
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to guard the Magic Fort overnight. Negu sends a mutant that’s a clone of Pai. Pai has to defeat himself using his own self-knowledge.

programme.title: Lunch Munch
programme.desc: GrandPA has some special guests visiting and Dunky has to make a lavish lunch.

programme.title: Baby On Loose
programme.desc: One fine day, Don finds a baby at his doorstep. But with the rats around, it is indeed a mission for don and colonel to keep the baby safe. Will the dogs keep the baby safe? What twist could possibly happen?

programme.title: Honey Shampoo – Goldilocks
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the story of Goldilocks, having been called out by her MOTHER. GOLDILOCKS has run away from home after a tremendous tantrum. The detective is optimistic, sure that this will be one of the easiest cases in her career. After all, the story of Goldilocks is an innocent tale in which nothing very much happens. Nothing could be further from the truth. It turns out that GOLDILOCKS is a devilishly difficult little girl, who gets the experienced detective and her long-suffering assistant into a series of perilous - and amusing - scrapes.

programme.title: Scolymus – The Sorcerer’s Apprentice
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the story of the SORCERER’S APPRENTICE, having been called out by the old sorcerer and mentor in the story. When he returned from his journey, he found his tower full of water, as in the classic tale. But, unlike the story, his APPRENTICE had also mysteriously disappeared. SANDRA will discover that the APPRENTICE has been kidnapped by SCOLYMUS, a sinister spirit invoked by the apprentice to do his work for him.

programme.title: Field Trip Fiasco
programme.desc: The bros set out for a trip to the great Qutab Minar. And they make sure that they got rid of the rat trio before entering. But Larry Charly and Marly are way too smarter than any of us. To make matters worse, they bombard the entire structure and put the blame on Don and Colonel. Will they ever escape this??

programme.title: Frogs – The Frog Prince
programme.desc: On this occasion, detective SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the story of the "Frog Prince", having been called out by the PRINCESS. The PRINCE, who is no longer a frog thanks to the PRINCESSs kiss, has started croaking and catching flies again, after eating a piece of cake. The PRINCE, the victim of a second spell, is gradually turning back into a frog. SANDRA and FO venture into a swamp, full of dangers and mysteries, in search of the sorceress BÁRBARA, in the hope of finding an antidote.

programme.title: Bobby's Day Out
programme.desc: The loose motion has caught on to Cat, when he agrees to babysit his neighboring cat Katreena’s neice for the afternoon.

programme.title: Stitch in Time
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: THE PAI WHO CRIED WOLF
programme.desc: To discover his powers as the Rodent Warrior, Pai goes on a solo night quest. But he keeps seeing the Wolf Warrior (Koto and Amkko in a disguise made by Mei). He runs to tell April and Xia, who don’t believe him. He battles the Wolf Warrior, discovering his Rodent Warrior powers (Super-Burrowing and Super-Cheeks) as he reveals Koto and Amkko inside the disguise.

programme.title: The Feast
programme.desc: GrandPA has some special guests visiting him. GrandPA tells Dunky in the morning to have a very tasty and mouth watering fish curry prepared for them.

programme.title: The Librarian
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: The Smighty Express
programme.desc: Creating Smighty Railroad, a secret way to the Smighty Stones, was a good idea, until the Villains found out. The Super Six must embark on a suspenseful and high-speed train race across all of Smightyland to stop Sneevil and Biggs in their locomotive from reaching the Stones first.

programme.title: The Princess's Party
programme.desc: Aladdin and Jamillah really want to go to the big party that the Princess is holding in the palace gardens but they dont even have an invitation, let alone anything to wear. Genie is convinced he can sneak them in, so he conjures up some great party threads but warns them that they will only last until sunset and they must be back before then or the clothes will disappear! The party is great fun until Aladdin gets carried away pretending to be visiting royalty and forgets the deadline leaving them exposed to the anger of the Grand Vizier. They try to make a run for it but he catches them and its only Genie swooping in at the last minute that saves them.

programme.title: Yes Gummy
programme.desc: Feeling a little ‘blah’, Gummy decides to say ‘yes’ to everything that crosses his path. Comic disaster, naturally, soon follows...

programme.title: The Big Picture
programme.desc: Mort snaps a picture of Brains fighting Aphrodite, a glamorous alien woman. After Mr. Fractal confiscates Mort’s camera phone, Mort and Fred compete to get it back.

programme.title: Verano tardío
programme.desc: Libia ni se imagina que en el pueblo lejano donde pasó su infancia la espera un nuevo amor.

programme.title: Matrimonio Ficticio
programme.desc: Kate y Sofía son hermanas y solo se tienen la una a la otra. Algo cambiará en sus vidas y las separará.

programme.title: Matrimonio Ficticio
programme.desc: Kate y Sofía son hermanas y solo se tienen la una a la otra. Algo cambiará en sus vidas y las separará.

programme.title: Matrimonio Ficticio

programme.title: NTD News Today
programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.title: NTD News Today
programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.title: How the Specter of Communism Is Ruling Our World
programme.desc: Adapted from the book; exploring how Communism stealthily found hosts around the world.

programme.desc: Al Aswaq Al Arabiya 2

programme.title: Power Lunch
programme.desc: The business team gathers and rounds up all GCC market activities with analysts from different markets sharing their views live.

programme.title: El Kaf
programme.desc: Director: Mohamed Hasieb - Cast: Farid Shawky / Madeha Yousri - Year of production: 1985

programme.title: Al Azraa Wal Shar Al Abyad
programme.desc: Director: Hussein Kamal - Cast: Nabila Ebeed / Mahmoud Abd El Aziz - Year of production: 1983

programme.title: Ahla Al Awat
programme.desc: Director: Hala Khaleel - Cast: Hanan Tork / Menna Shalaby / Hend Sabri - Year of production: 2004

programme.title: Al Waad
programme.desc: Director: Mohamed Yassin - Cast: Roubi / Aser Yassin - Year of production: 2008

programme.title: Ebn El Consul
programme.desc: Director: Amr Arafa - Cast: Ahmed El Saka - Gada AAdl / - Year of production: 2010

programme.title: Love At First Bite
programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.title: Love At First Bite
programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?"

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: Scotty Finds a Home 1935
programme.desc: A young anthropomorphic kitten wants a pet. He happens to find a puppy with no owner and takes him in. When the Scotty tracks mud into the house, Grandma says that her grandson cannot keep him. A transient bulldog is walking by as Grandma puts a pie in the windowsill to cool. He barges into the house and terrorizes the family, demanding they feed him. Scotty rushes back to the house and saves the family, causing Grandma to decide that they can keep him after all.

programme.title: You Can't Shoe a Horse Fly 1940
programme.desc: Hunky and Spunky are settling in for a nap, but a horse fly sees them and sees dinner. After battling the fly for a while, the youngster enlists dad's help. But the fly is merely stunned, and rallies a new attack, this time with friends. Father eventually kills the lot of them

programme.title: I'm in the Army Now 1936
programme.desc: To impress Olive, Bluto and Popeye try to convince an Army recruiter to sign him up.

programme.title: Now Hear This 1962
programme.desc: In this very abstract cartoon, a hard-of-hearing old Britisher finds a red horn and uses it as a megaphone, unaware that it is really a lost horn from the Devil's forehead. The Britisher finds that the horn has the effect of amplifying every sound psychedelically and causing him serious bodily harm

programme.title: Patriotic Popeye 1957
programme.desc: Popeye is enjoying watering his patriotic garden on July 4 when he catches his nephews attempting to light fireworks. The game is on when he attempts to confiscate the fireworks and the boys strike back with edgy pranks. Bluto and Olive Oyl do not appear in this cartoon.

programme.title: Spree Lunch 1957
programme.desc: Popeye opens a diner; Bluto pulls one up right across the street. Wimpy comes along, and they compete for his business. The competition escalates, until finally they are throwing things at each other; Wimpy stands between them and snags a complete meal from the stream of objects passing overhead. Another spinach-free Popeye.

programme.title: Betty Boop- Buzzy Boop 1938
programme.desc: Betty's young cousin, Buzzy, takes the train to visit Betty. On the train, she's helpful, in a bratty kind of way, using her chewing gum to stick on a sleeping man's toupee, watering the flowers in a lady's hat, etc. At Betty's house, she sees the boys next door playing marbles and tries to join in; she proves better at things like walking on a fence than the boys, and even fares well with the goat the boys unleash

programme.title: I Never Changes My Altitude 1937
programme.desc: Popeye is sitting outside Olive's lunchroom at the airport, distraught. She's closed the business to fly away with an aviator (Bluto, of course). But it's hardly what she expected; he has her painting his plane, while it's flying; when she says she's rather go back to Popeye, he tries to throw her off the plane. Popeye sees this, and takes off in a plane, just in time to help her out. The boys get into a dogfight, and Bluto manages to demolish Popeye's plane. As Popeye is falling, he grabs a duck and feeds the duck spinach. The duck manages to fly him up to Bluto's plane, Popeye has some spinach of his own, and he teaches Bluto a lesson. Popeye picks up Olive and crashes the plane into the diner, opening it (and providing a new counter).

programme.title: Little Nemo-1911
programme.desc: Little Nemo-1911

programme.title: A Car Tune Portrait -1937
programme.desc: A Car Tune Portrait -1937

programme.title: A Ham in a Role 1949
programme.desc: A Shakespearian dog, tired of being a pie-in-the-face looney tune, quits Warner Brothers to study dramatic acting and goes to his country house to practice the bard. He finds that two polite twin gophers have taken over his abode and angrily throws them out. They retaliate by violently heckling him in comical accordance with his Shakespeare speeches.

programme.title: A Cartoonist's Nightmare 1935
programme.desc: A cartoonist falls victim to the very villains he has drawn. It's up to Beans the Cat to save the day.

programme.title: Fox Pop 1942
programme.desc: Hearing that silver foxes are all the rage in high society, a fox paints himself silver and gets himself trapped, finding out too late that it's only his fur anyone is interested in

programme.title: Floor Flusher 1954
programme.desc: Popeye and Bluto stop by to see Olive and fix her leaky faucet. Popeye does it better, and Bluto gets jealous, so he starts rerouting Olive's plumbing and causing all sorts of leaks. Popeye needs some help from the goldfish to get to his spinach

programme.title: War Babies 1932
programme.desc: A group of soldiers in a café watch a dancer as she entertains them, but later two of them become rivals over her.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show 1963: Season 3; Episode 24;Aunt Bee's Medicine Man
programme.desc: Andy must protect Aunt Bee from a charming traveling dishonest huckster whose 170-proof "tonic" provides temporary relief from mid-life crisis.

programme.title: Safety Last!1923
programme.desc: A boy leaves his small country town and heads to the big city to get a job. As soon as he makes it big his sweetheart will join him and marry him. His enthusiasm to get ahead leads to some interesting adventures.

programme.title: Dough and Dynamite-1914
programme.desc: Charlie and another waiter must become bakers when the regular bakers go out on strike. The strikers put dynamite in a piece of bread which is delivered to the cake counter. It winds up in the oven and explodes.

programme.title: Making a Living 1914
programme.desc: An out-of-work swindler takes a job as a reporter. After witnessing a car go over cliff, he grabs a rival reporter's camera and races to the newspaper office to enter the photo as his own. His rival is delayed when he gets caught in a woman's bedroom by her jealous husband. The swindler follows the distribution of the paper containing his 'scoop' around town where he is once again chased by the rival reporter. Both end up on the cow-catcher of a streetcar

programme.title: The Property Man 1916
programme.desc: Charlie has trouble with actors' luggage and conflicts over who gets the star's dressing room. There are further difficulties with frequent scene changes, wrong entries and a fireman's hose. At one point he juggles an athlete's supposed weights. The humor is still rough: he kicks an older assistant in the face and allows him to be run over by a truck

programme.title: Alice's Wonderland-1923
programme.desc: Alice visits an animation studio, where the animators show her various scenes on their drawing boards. A few of them: a cat dancing to a cat band; a mouse poking at a (live) cat until it moves; a couple mice boxing, while the animators crowd around cheering and acting as corner-men. That night, she dreams of taking a train to cartoon-land, where a red carpet reception awaits. She appears in live action. They have a welcoming parade, with Alice riding on an elephant. The cartoons dance for her, and she dances for them. Meanwhile, the lions break out of the zoo. The lions chase her into a hollow tree, then into a cave and down a rabbit hole. Finally, she jumps off a cliff and awakes back in her bed

programme.title: Bliss- 1917
programme.desc: A counterfeit count is aided in his courtship of the heroine by her father who is overwhelmed by his 'title.'

programme.title: Mabel's Strange Predicament 1914
programme.desc: In a hotel lobby, an inebriated Charlie runs into an elegant lady, gets tied up in her dog's leash, and falls down. He later runs into her in the hotel corridor, locked out of her room. They run through various rooms. Mabel ends up in one, hiding under the bed of an elderly husband. Enter the jealous wife and Mabel's lover.

programme.title: Misbehaving Husbands 1940
programme.desc: The owner of a department store is threatened with divorce by his wife, who has gotten reports that he's been seen in the arms of a beautiful blonde on the night of their 20th wedding anniversary. He has to find a way to convince her that the "beautiful blonde" in question was actually a store mannequin that he was taking in for repairs

programme.title: See what happened in the world of sports while you were sleeping!
The latest sports that you may have missed!
You are watching the latest sports news from around the world!
Game previews, highlights and interviews from your favorite sport!

The Lone Ranger : S1E1: Enter the Lone Ranger
programme.desc: Ranger Reid, the sole surviving Texas Ranger of a murderous ambush, becomes the great masked hero with his companion, Tonto. Note: We do not know the first name of Ranger Reid. It is never said during the entire series

programme.title: The Hard Hombre 1931
programme.desc: When Peaceful Patton goes to work at the Martini ranch he is mistaken for the notorious outlaw the Hard Hombre. This enables him to force the ranchers to divide up the water rights. But he is in trouble when his mother arrives and exposes the hoax.

programme.title: Hell-Fire Austin 1932
programme.desc: Heading west, Ken and Bouncer end up at the Brooks ranch where Ken is to ride Tarzan in the big race. But both the Sheriff and Edmonds are after him and he must hide both himself and the horse until race time.

programme.title: Guns in the Dark 1937
programme.desc: When Johnny and Mendez argue, the lights go out, and in the ensuing gunfight Johnny thinks he killed his friend Dick. Now refusing to wear a gun he crosses the border. But it is not long before he runs into Mendez and more trouble.

programme.title: Who Saw The Men In Black
Guest Erick Sermon
programme.desc: Erick Sermon is half of the legendary Hip-Hop duo EPMD and also an incredible producer who’s worked with Kanye, Dr. Dre and more. We talk about making music with both Kanye and Dre, the rise of EPMD, the breakup of EPMD, and stories from a life in Hip-Hop. Amazing convo with an icon.

programme.title: Guest David Alan Grier
programme.desc: David Alan Grier shines as a funny doctor on the new NBC sitcom St Denis Medical. He’s at a point in his career when he only does things he really wants to do. Including this podcast. We talk a lot about his new show and In Living Color and A Soldier’s Story.

programme.title: TRL, Caffeine Kid, Sting, Convo One Night Stand
programme.desc:
In this week’s episode Nessa and Katrina B take a trip down memory lane and throw it back to the TRL era and some of their fondest memories. This was brought on by Nessa’s recent HOT97 with the living legends STING and SHAGGY! Find out what Nessa and Katrina B had to say about these two music icons along with some other megastars that came up from the bottom and their journeys!
In parenting news, Katrina B shares a HILARIOUS story about how she accidentally gave her kid a boatload of caffeine! All we’ll say is WATCH OUT for those drinks at Starbucks that ARE NOT coffee…
Finally, what would happen if we treated our daily conversations like one night stands and said what we wanted to say like we were never going to see that person again?!? Well, these two certainly have different opinions and it makes for a VERY lively conversation that you don’t want to miss!

programme.title: Vegan Travel with Eunice Reyes - Magnifique Montreal
programme.desc: Montreal is dripping with culture and cuisine and Eunice Reyes takes you on a dazzling food tour.

programme.title: New Day New Chef - "Meaty" Tower & Tofu Scramble
programme.desc: Restaurant owner Sarkis Vartanian joins Bodybuilders Korin Sutton and Ryan Nelson!

programme.title: Life in a Sanctuary
programme.desc: This unique film explores living in a sanctuary, from the animals' point of view.

programme.title: Luscious Lasagna with The Spicy Vegans
programme.desc: Get your spice on with this flavor explosion!

programme.title: The Vegan Roadie - Portland Rocks!
programme.desc: A full rack of BBQ ribs that are 100% plant-based and delicious! Seitan is the secret in Portland!

programme.title: The Most Intense Demonstration Ever
programme.desc: Follow along with Direct Action Everywhere as hundreds invade the San Francisco Ferry Building!

programme.title: The Vegan Roadie - Asheville's Good Vibes!
programme.desc: Asheville, known for beer and good vibes. Now, add plant-based deliciousness to it.

programme.title: Sleaford Mods' Vegan Musician
programme.desc: Andrew Fearn is a member of the popular and controversial UK band Sleaford Mods.

programme.title: The Secret Reason We Eat Meat
programme.desc: Wouldn't you like to know?

programme.title: Trying Vegan With Mario - How Not to Die
programme.desc: How Not to Die: The Groundbreaking Bestseller Transforming Health and Nutrition

programme.title: Ghost Boat
programme.desc: Trapped aboard the family yacht, Samantha lives out her personal Hell, night after night, answering to the cruel and painful demands of the ship's alarm system. Taking a journey into the depths of depravity, she wakes each morning to the disfiguring scars left by the previous night's horror and searches for the answer to a missing memory: 'Could I have killed my family... Or did Hell get it wrong?

programme.title: H.P. Lovecraft's Monster Portal
programme.desc: A cult is about to waken H.P. Lovecraft's most feared creature...

programme.title: Remember Me
programme.desc: Rose awakes in an unknown house following a serious car accident with memory loss and no ability to walk. Her Mother and boyfriend are there to help her. Rose wants to piece together her life before the accident. All is not what it seems...

programme.title: La Feria del Diablo
programme.desc: Protagonizada por Justin Duncan, Gerald Crum, Mercedes Peterson y John Charles Dickson. Las estrellas de dos series de televisión paranormales, rivales y enfrentadas, convergen en un parque de atracciones embrujado y abandonado que termina siendo el epicentro del infierno. Ahora están todos atrapados en una guerra sin cuartel contra el mal puro...

programme.title: Naufragio
programme.desc: Mientras transportaba un paquete importante, una joven sufre un accidente de coche en medio de la nada, dejándola atrapada debajo del coche. Poco a poco, se da cuenta de que no solo unos hombres muy malvados la persiguen para recuperar el objeto que transporta, sino que algo muy peligroso la acecha desde las profundidades del bosque...

programme.title: El Juego del Duende
programme.desc: Después de que un hombre adinerado envía a un grupo de ladrones a buscar leyendas urbanas con la intención de abrir un museo lleno de criaturas míticas, pronto descubrirán la leyenda de un duende...

programme.title: Caribe Sangriento
programme.desc: En un enfrentamiento entre policías y traficantes, una extraña fuerza se apodera de un hombre, concediéndole un super poder.

programme.title: El Pistolero
programme.desc: Uno de los hombres más poderosos de México llega a un pueblo en busca de nuevos pistoleros que quieran formal parte de su equipo, y recluta a un hombre sencillo que acepta el trabajo porque quiere vengar la muerte de su padre.

programme.title: Brindis Mortal
programme.desc: te presentamos la historia de Ramon, el hijo de un poderoso narcotraficante quien anhela convertirse en la mano derecha de su padre y formar parte de su grupo de sicarios. Pero su padre aun no lo considera listo para el trabajo y le da largas. lo cual desespera a Ramon y lo lleva a tomar decisiones que cambiaran para siempre la relación entre padre e hijo.

programme.title: Amar
programme.desc: Carlos quiere pero Susana no. Joel no quiere pero Patricia lo obliga. Gabriel lo espera pero Martha no se lo da. Amado lo busca con una gringa y lo pierde. Benito lo tiene toda la vida. Concha se lo lleva más allá del sistema solar. Todos lo quieren y todos lo dan pero unos no lo reciben y otros quieren más. Así es Amar.

programme.title: Fecha De Caducidad
programme.desc: Ramona deja a un lado su papel de madre sumisa y abnegada para convertirse en la principal detective del paradero de su único hijo Osvaldo, un hombre holgazán y vividor que desaparece misteriosamente, sin dejar rastro alguno.

programme.title: El Karma de Carmen
programme.desc: Carmen tiene 36 años y no logra adecuarse al mundo y a la sociedad en que vive. Tampoco tiene pareja y eso la preocupa. En una rifa de Navidad, Carmen se gana el premio mayor: una semana con todo pago para dos personas en Mar del Plata. Carmen no está dispuesta a irse sola. El viaje y su soledad es su disparador para iniciar el cambio.

programme.title: 48 Horas de Terror
programme.desc: Mateo un escritor citadino adquiere una casa de campo en donde planea vivir con su esposa y escribir en la tranquilidad del campo, pero no tomo en cuenta las trágicas noticias de los acontecimientos de canibalismo que ocurrieron a manos de sus vecinos quienes solo buscan sacias su hambre. Mateo y su esposa corren por sus vidas entre las desoladas montañas buscando sobrevivir al ataque de estos caníbales al final sobrevivirá el más fuerte

programme.title: Expediente 53
programme.desc: Esta es una historia de misterio y acción en la ciudad de Bryan Texas el comandante Gatel pide la ayuda del FBI ya que hay muchos desaparecidos, y asesinatos en la ciudad. Los agentes Gutiérrez, Bracho y Miravalle del FBI le comentan al comandante Gatel que ellos sospechan que puede ser obra de una secta satánica y que el líder es un demonio de nombre Abal que está en el cuerpo de una bella mujer de nombre Lilly.

programme.title: Expediente 53 3.0
programme.desc: Un extraño ser del más allá regresa con sed de venganza para acabar con todas las personas que lo han estado atormentando por todos estos años, decidiendo poseer a Jack y darle más fuerza a Baal.

programme.title: Breaking The Bondage Of Wrong Belief
programme.desc: The belief that we need something other than God is what keeps us from going through breakthroughs. That’s how we can be in covenant with God but still in captivity. In “Breaking The Bondage Of Wrong Belief,” Pastor Steven Furtick helps us break up with what’s been holding us back.

programme.title: Rescue Your Testimony
programme.desc: Pastor Steven Furtick helps us deal with disappointment and revive our hope in “Rescue Your Testimony.” You’ll be encouraged to tell your story through the lens of God’s faithfulness.

programme.title: Reverse The Ripple
programme.desc: An event is not your identity. In “Reverse The Ripple,” Pastor Steven Furtick helps us go back to the source of what we’re going through so we can begin to write a new story for our lives.

programme.title: Instruments Of Victory
programme.desc: In “Instruments Of Victory,” we’re reminded that victory comes when we place our gifts and even our insecurities in God’s hands.
